Pior jogo que você pode comprar. Não gaste dinheiro com uma merda dessas. Se você tem uma equipe legal pra jogar dá pra pensar, pelo contrario você só vai jogar com cara que é bot e não sabe fazer o básico. Sério, não perca seu dinheiro nisso. É pra passar raiva apenas. Se não é um bot no seu time é um assassino com uma vantagem tirada do cu onde fode tudo que você já fez na partida inteira. Na mora, estou falando, não perca dinheiro com essa merda. Vai comprar maconha, arriscar levar um tiro em uma troca de bala entre policia e traficante, mas não compre essa merda. Juro, se você gosta de enfiar garfos no seu cu, então compre essa bosta, pelo contrário não perca dinheiro.

Unsurprisingly despite this review, I will continue to play this game, as shocking as that might sound, because the highs are SUPER high, even when the lows are 500ft below sea-level and a lot of people will not find it enjoyable when they start to experience the disrespectful nature of some players, even if the game has a lot to offer with diverse characters, maps and perks.

In summary, implement a form of matchmaking that puts people of similar level/skill together to make things substantially more fair for everyone involved from a developer's objective and be respectful to the people you play with/against from a player's objective, until at least the former can be made reality, it's a frustrating experience.

si bien es un juego competitivo y entretenido,divertido en la mayoria de los casos.pero por mi parte esta desbalanceado,no solo por el matchmaking sino tambien por el hecho de que el juego esta mas a favor de los supervivientes que del asesino,debido a que el tiempo que se tarda en reparar los generadores es muy corto como para que al principio de la partida ya se reparen 2 0 3 generadores(si bien hay habilidades para que se les haga mas dificil el repararlo pero aun asi se hace muy rapido).no he jugado mucho como asesino pero he jugado lo suficiente como para darme cuenta de eso,al igual que si juego como superviviente tambien me doy cuenta que para reparar un generador te tomas menos de 1min. si bien no conseguis muchos puntos como superviviente pero aun asi tenes garantizado mas de 5000 puntos en objetivos,por otra parte como asesino sacas muchos mas puntos que jugando como superviviente(teniendo en cuenta tambien que hay habilidades para aumentar tus puntos).en fin, les recomiendo este juego para divertirse y pasarla bien en un grupo con amigos pero quiero que tengan esto en cuenta.son partidas cortas de menos de 20min o si tenes la suerte de que sean mas para poder conseguir mas puntos pero en la mayoria de los casos son de 20min o menos,tambien que los generadores van a volar en menos de 2min pero el lado positivo que si lo haces bien conseguis muchos puntos como asesino. A DISFRUTAR!!!

Ни в  коем случае  не покупайте эту игру!
Поиграл пару  дней (19-23 ноября 2020).
Отвратительный дисбаланс подбора  игроков,  какой смысл  закидывать человека сурва с 15 уровнем (перса),  к ману с  фул абилами (наед, барбекю и тд.) наигранными 1000 часов  ?.
Самое отвратное играть за мана против тимы которая сидит и  общается через стороннее приложение,  убирая тем самым ограничения для сурвов накладываемые игрой, если это не прямое читерство то я даже и не знаю что это.
Хотите общаться создавайте  приватные игры  и  катайте в  них друг против друга. А не так что трое  заводят  гены,  а один  сидит и  палит  маньяка предупреждая  других о приближении мана, можно всю игру  так ходить за тимой, но вы сука ни кого не найдете, так как  эти упыри бегают по кругу  от  гена до гена  и  ремонт быстрее  регресса.
Решение проблемы с тимами только одно,  подбор сурвов по IP из разных стран (но тут возможны большие пинги что опять будет  плохо....)

За отключение кровожадности у охотницы для начального мана  отдельное спасибо,  просто ахуенно  бегать  за мана по кругу и не имя возможности догнать сурва, который в случае опасности врубит спринт, орех...и будет в  полной безопасности.....

Mostly fun, but can get dull fast.
Matchmaking is a mess, you'll get rank 1 enemies while you/your team is 15-20, and such.
Most stuff is hidden behind DLC paywall and while most of the base characters are strong, it gets boring with such limited options.
There are also plenty of balance issues. There are plenty of meta slaves and will generally be toxic at you for not playing certain characters and/or perks. You will also just be generally screwed with the unbalanced stuff. Moral of it is, unless you're a 200 IQ player, don't play to win or get rank 1, especially if you play survivor alone. 
There are also issues with the players. Random people WILL give up when they instantly get hooked when they play stupid and leave you underhanded and the killer will just 99% win. This happens rather often, I'd say about 3-4 out of 10 games playing with random survivors. These numbers also vary depending on your rank, but still.

I still recommend it though. In its core, it is genuinely good. I also personally love the design, with the game icon being crossed by the killer, very smart design.

This game is a love/hate one. The developers act oblivious to the community and give changes that people have never requested while ignoring the ones that have. They've grown complacent and the only way for actual progress to game health is if another game is developed that rivals this one.

I would actually play this on PC but my PS account has too many hours put into it. The game has too much grind that it's not worth my time to restart here on PC and so I'll foolishly wait until a cross-progression gets added about 5 years down the line.

Esse game é ótimo, tirando os argentinos, os colombianos, os peruanos, bolivianos, venezuelanos e todos os sulamericanos que falam espanhol.
O melhor de tudo é você caçar cada um deles, enquanto eles fogem apenas pra adiar o inevitável. E o choro depois na sala de pós partida? MARAVILHA!!! ''TUNELERO'' ''CAMPERO'' ''MALO'' e mais uma porrada de palavras em espanhol. Tudo nesse jogo é uma delícia, os grito dos mono claudete no gancho, os cara com ''ttv'' chorando no pós partida e os colombianos/bolivianos/argentinos/peruanos chorando por que eu ganhei e eles não... Enfim, nesse jogo o sofrimento alheio é reconfortante. ABENÇOADOS SEJAM OS MAIN HAG, LOUVADA SEJA A ENTIDADE \O/

Could not really recommend it -- community has its problems and the developers do not seem to know how to balance their own game in a way that is amicable to everyone. I get that it is not really possible to do so but they do not even seem to come close. The balance sort of teeters back and forth between being unbalanced in one way towards one side and in another way towards the other. A lot of everything is dependent on rng in-game (what pallets and obstacles to loop the killer on will be spawning and where) and on what perks your opponent(s) will be bringing, what killer is being played, etc. This would lead one to believe there is a lot of variety and replayability. However, for a large portion of the community it seems that mainly a core group of the same perks and killers are used over and over, mixed and matched with slightly different variations. Thus the game can generally be sort of repetitive in an irritating way at times. You will often find yourself playing against the same type of opponent more-or-less with the same play-style over and over. Similar chases and experiences that can sort of grind you down. Still, the game can be a lot of fun and challenging, and I would say I have some mixed feelings about it. As I am sure a lot of others do as well. Still, I would not recommend it, I would say it is not worth the time anymore as it may have once been as you need to spend a good deal of time learning the intricacies of the perks and killers and maps and loops and which way to loop and how to loop and mind game and yadda yadda yadda. Who knows though maybe there will be a comeback for the game at some point and I will edit this review again to be more favourable. Either way do whatever you want. Maybe you still feel it would be worth it, I do not really blame you. I too am masochistic my BROS
